text: Mu mwanya aba Marayika baramu shikiriza ubutumwa nawe ahagaze ariko arasengera mucumba yuko Imana igushikirije inkuru nziza y’intumwa y’Imana Yahya (iii) yuko azoba ariwe azokwemeza kw’ijambo rizoba rivuye Kumana, n’uwuzoba ari umugabo abukwiye atarigera yubaka urwiwe n’ukuba intumwa y’Imana ivuye mubantu beranda
